Posts.Content: Hi, I have been taking Arimidex for about three months and my Cholestrol shot up for 200 to 250!  I can not take the drugs, but try to control it with diet, exercise and Niacin.  I don't know of anything else which would have caused the increase.  Has anyone else experienced this? Mariee
Posts.Title: Arimidex=High Cholestrol?
